{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking which of the given options is not used for preventing postpartum haemorrhage (PPH). From the documents, it is clear that Misoprostol (Document 0, 2, 21), Oxytocin (Document 0, 2, 14, 17, 21, 24, 26, 28), and PGF-2 alpha (Prostaglandin F2 alpha, which is a type of prostaglandin and can be inferred from the mention of prostaglandins in Document 2) are used for preventing PPH. However, there is no mention of Dinoprostone being used for the prevention of PPH.", "answer_choice": "B"}
